metadata.title: CVE-2017-7788 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: When an "iframe" has a "sandbox" attribute and its content is specified using "srcdoc", that content does not inherit the containing page's Content Security Policy (CSP) as it should unless the sandbox attribute included "allow-same-origin". This vulnerability affects Firefox < 55.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs38 contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.2+build1-0ubuntu4').
